      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String qvturi,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> insturis)
              throws ErrorAlloy
        Checks if instances are consistent according to a QVT transformation
        Parameters:
        qvturi - the URI of the QVT-R transformation
        insturis - the URIs of the instances (should be in the order of the QVT-R transformation arguments)
        Returns:
        true if consistent
        Throws:
        ErrorAlloy

      • enforce

        public boolean enforce(java.lang.String qvturi,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> insturis,
              java.lang.String targetarg)
                throws ErrorAlloy
        Starts enforcement run according to a QVT transformation
        Parameters:
        qvturi - the URI of the QVT-R transformation
        insturis - the URIs of the instances (should be in the order of the QVT-R transformation arguments)
        targetarg - the direction of the enforce (should be an argument of the QVT-R transformation)
        Returns:
        true if able to generate instance
        Throws:
        ErrorAlloy
